item.title: Spindle
item.description:
Title: Spindle
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG
Developer: Wobble Ghost
Publisher: Deck13
Franchise: Deck13 Spotlight , Focus Entertainment
Release Date: Oct 13, 2025




About This Game

On a fateful day, you awaken ... in a world that feels utterly foreign to you.

This is where you make a surprising realization: You are... Death?

Why you of all people? And what even happened in the first place?

A TRUSTY COMPANION

A talking sword? A wise mentor? Think again!

Only a Pig stands by your side! üê∑

You set off together - but soon a horrible conundrum arises: No one is able to die anymore?! How long will a world without death be able to last?

DUNGEONS

To find answers, you make your way through perilous dungeons. But not every problem can be solved with a scythe! Only those who pay close attention will find a path to the deepest parts of the dungeon and closer to evil's root.

BOSSES

Mysterious creatures lurk in the depths, scheming to obstruct your path. Do they keep guard over the lost souls? Or are they indeed the reason that nobody may ever die again?

FEATURES

  • Don the Grim Reaper's cape and find out what it truly means to be Death.

  • You can pet the Pig ... and play as it!

  • Explore a beautiful world filled with secrets and discover its truly unique landscapes!

  • Delve into five challenging dungeons and face their riddles, traps and secrets!

  • From tiny creatures to giant bosses - every battle will challenge you in new ways!

  • Every character you meet will develop and change throughout the story.

  • Experience a gripping tale about death and the many ways we choose to deal with it.

Descrierea con»õinutului pentru adul»õi indisponibilƒÉ.

System Requirements

Windows

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.

MacOS

* Starting February 15, 2024, the Steam Client will no longer support 32-bit games or macOS 10.14 or lower.

Linux

item.title: Concubine
item.description:
Title: Concubine
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG , Early Access
Developer: Upgrade Entertainment
Publisher: Upgrade Entertainment
Release Date: Oct 13, 2025
Early Access Release Date: Oct 13, 2025




About This Game

Explore the mystic setting of medieval Istanbul in this sensual, dark fantasy hack & slash ARPG. Create & customize a concubine and up to three female companions with deep face & body details, or choose a companion from an arsenal of supernatural entities to fight side by side with your concubine party. Live in disguise as a concubine at harem by day, hunt ancient enemies of Byzantine & Ottoman empires at night. Explore your way through monumental points of interest of medieval Istanbul & fight intense battles with hordes of a secret cult, led by evil monster bosses of ancient Anatolian mythology.

Concubine contains optional natural full nudity, relatively endless levels of character & companion customization, a vast collection of armor, weaponry & costumes to build the concubine party of your dreams.

The detailed character customization includes dozens of body & face sliders such as height, weight, muscle mass, breast and butt size & shape, waist width, skin complexion, eye, nose, mouth, lip, jaw size and depth and more, including makeups, tattoos, scars.

The hyper realistic skin rendering will allow you to see your concubines in extreme detail and you can change the look of your concubines anytime, giving you endless possibilities of creating the concubine party of your dreams.

Decorate your Harem room, expand base with additional rooms, cellars, dungeons, hamams. Purchase furniture, paint, art & accessories and rent attractive, customizable maids to create the perfect base for your concubines. Beds, couches, tubs & different types of palace furniture will let you create perfect bases in Grand Palace & other historical locations.

The combat will be challenging. Starting from street thugs of medieval Istanbul to end level bosses of dark crypts below the city, you will battle different classes of enemies with unique skills, abilities & strategies. The more enemies you fight, the more random skills you can learn from them, letting you to build your concubine & companions with unique skill trees. Swords, daggers, maces, bows & spells are your weapons choices, as well as special weapons like whips.

Use your map to travel to monumental buildings, palaces, temples & underground crypts of Istanbul. Unlock new areas by following the epic story line, or fight in random instances to equip your concubine & copanions. The treasures of medieval Istanbul will gift you with virtually endless armor, weapons, costumes, accessories & skills to loot.

As you travel & fight your way, you will meet beautiful, skilled companions to rescue & add to your party. Customize your new companions, gear & costume them up, build their skill trees & teach them new spells & strategies. Your companions will also live in your Harem base, and you can see them in their daily routines -sleeping, bathing, entertaining- when you are not outside adventuring.

Free Pose Mode lets you strike the perfect pose anywhere in your palace or in cleared instances to capture stunning shots, while Photo Mode allows you to pause mid-combat, adjust the camera, lighting, and focus, so you can immortalize your most epic battles.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Concubine is a dark fantasy action RPG featuring stylized combat with blood effects. Characters wear suggestive fantasy attire (e.g. bikini/sexy armor), and optional nudity (partial or full) is present in character customization screens and armors can be set visible/invisible by players. No sexual acts or sexual violence are depicted.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Ryzen 5 5500 or Intel i5 12500
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia GTX1070Ti 8GB or Radeon RX6600 8GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 10 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11
    • Processor: Ryzen 5 5500 or Intel i5 12500
    • Memory: 24 GB RAM
    • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2080 8GB or Radeon RX7600 8GB
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 10 GB available space

item.title: Undusted: Letters from the Past
item.description:
Title: Undusted: Letters from the Past
Genre: Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: 5minlab Corp.
Publisher: Toge Productions
Franchise: Toge Productions
Release Date: Oct 13, 2025




About This Game

IIn Undusted: Letters from the Past, you are tasked with cleaning items that have fallen into disrepair.

Dust, scrub, and polish your way through the chapters to learn the personal backstory behind each item.

Adora returns home after her mother's passing.

She starts to clean long-neglected items inside her family home.

As those items are restored to their original conditions, they start whispering memories of the past.

As Adora cleans, she discovers a myriad of forgotten stories, some hidden away.

What kind of stories will she experience?

Virtual ASMR

Experience carefully crafted sound effects that capture the essence of each tool you use.

Each chapter's ambient audio will wholly immerse you in the game!

A Touching Story

Recall the memories associated with each item.

When did Adora and her mother's relationship start to fall apart?

Will she be able to finally understand her mother after her passing?

A Charming Art Style

Appreciate a captivating art style that is uniquely expressed through pixelated textures.

Game Features

  • Experience a heartfelt and emotional story about family.

  • Forget about time limits and failure‚Äîjust relax and enjoy! The items won't break like they would in real life!

  • Admire beautiful artwork that charmingly portrays Adora's story.

  • Listen to original background music that complements the relaxing gameplay.

  • Enjoy the oddly satisfying feeling from ASMR and restoration videos, but in a game!

Descrierea con»õinutului pentru adul»õi indisponibilƒÉ.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
    • Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: A DirectX11-compatible GPU (Shader Model 5.0)
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Any
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10/11 (64bit)
    • Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: A DirectX11-compatible GPU (Shader Model 5.0)
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 2 GB available space
    • Sound Card: Any

item.title: Snoopy & The Great Mystery Club
item.description:
Title: Snoopy & The Great Mystery Club
Genre: Adventure
Developer: Cradle Games
Publisher: GameMill Entertainment
Franchise: GameMill Entertainment
Release Date: Oct 10, 2025




About This Game

There‚Äôs No Case Snoopy Can‚Äôt Solve!

Join Snoopy and the gang in an all-new mystery adventure packed with charm, clever puzzles, and heartwarming friendships! Step into Snoopy‚Äôs paws and detective hat as you explore the town, solve challenging cases, and uncover hidden secrets‚Äîwith help from the lovable Peanuts gang.

Whether you're investigating strange happenings at the school, chasing clues through the forest, each case is filled with brain-teasing challenges and unexpected surprises. Build your own team of four from familiar friends such as Peppermint Patty, Lucy, Marcie, Schroeder, Franklin and others‚Äîeach bringing their own special skills to the case.

Lighthearted, witty, and full of classic Peanuts charm, this feel-good action-puzzle adventure is ideal for both the young and the young at heart!

KEY FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ PLAY AS SNOOPY!: Snoopy‚Äôs on the case as you take charge of The Great Mystery Club! Build your custom squad of the lovable Peanuts gang‚Äîeach with unique abilities and quirky strengths that bring fun and strategy to every puzzle.

‚Ä¢ EXPLORE ICONIC LOCATIONS: Journey through the town as you solve mysteries and puzzles. Visit the gang‚Äôs school, the iconic music hall, Charlie Brown‚Äôs house, the baseball field, the Kite eating tree, and more as you uncover surprises and twists!

‚Ä¢ SNOOPY‚ÄôS ON THE CASE: Switch between Snoopy‚Äôs personas‚ÄîDetective, Beagle Scout, Fierce Pirate, and more‚Äîto solve puzzles with clever tools like a leaf blower, a super-sleuth's magnifying glass, a trusty metal detector, and more. Each role unlocks fun new ways to crack part of the case!

‚Ä¢ MYSTERY CLUB MINI-GAMES: Take some swings at home plate, try kicking the football, work in the lab, play a tune, and race to the finish! Have a blast with baseball, football, crafting, memory tests, object hunts, piano playing, soapbox derbies‚Äîand take flight in the legendary Sopwith Camel to chase down the Red Baron!

‚Ä¢ A STORY PACKED WITH HEART & HUMOR: Enjoy humorous and delightful encounters and an emotional story that celebrates the power of friendship, teamwork, and staying true to who you are.

‚Ä¢ INTERACTIVELY IMMERSERSE YOURSLE IN THE WORLD PEANUTS: With its charming creative direction and gameplay, enjoy a visually stunning adventure that combines modern, soft graphics with the nostalgic, adventurous tone of the beloved Peanuts brand.

    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: GTX 950
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 8 GB available space

item.title: Dice Legends
item.description:
Title: Dice Legends
Genre: Indie , RPG
Developer: Big Bite Games , Ad Luna
Publisher: Ad Luna , Big Bite Games
Release Date: Oct 10, 2025




About This Game

Dice Legends is a single-player roguelike from an indie team including the creative mind behind GWENT and Cyberpunk: Edgerunners , featuring original music by the composer from Balatro .

In the game, you embark on an adventure in a high fantasy world as one of three characters ‚Äî each representing a distinct class that uses a different type of dice: d6, d8, or d12.

With every defeated monster, you acquire new cards enhancing your build and tactical possibilities. But crafting a deck is only one part of the fun ‚Äî the unpredictable nature of rolling the dice must be managed and controlled with items, card combinations, and power-ups. Dice Legends is all about using your game knowledge, wits, and a touch of luck to find that game-breaking combo that feels sooo satisfying to play!

Roll a pool of dice each turn and draw cards from your deck. Next, use dice to activate cards and set up your defense, debuff the enemy, or deal as much damage as you can. The more card-dice synergies you discover, the more unstoppable ‚Äî and satisfying! ‚Äî your combos become.

Choose from three heroes who specialize in different dice:

  • Lion Paladin ARIE ‚Äî wields the power of the d6 dice to unleash immense damage or shield himself against incoming attacks.

  • Crow Demon Summoner KURO ‚Äî manipulates the d12 dice to conjure and command powerful familiars onto the battlefield.

  • Toad Assassin XIN ‚Äî agile shadow magic user that taps into the power of the d8 dice to accumulate damage over time or deliver massive critical damage.

Enter a world where a magical cataclysm transformed all humans into terrifying beasts. Choose where to go and what to discover, as you travel across the map in search of clues that reveal the story. With each successfully cleared location, you will obtain build-defining weapons, armor, accessories, and more. Once you craft the ultimate gear-card combination, take down the final boss and become a Dice Legend!

  • 160 hand-drawn cards offering multiple options for synergies and combos

  • 50+ enemies with multiple skills to challenge your best decks

  • 4 visually distinct worlds ‚Äî each with its own set of monsters and challenges

  • 3 Heroes with unique play styles and different deck-building mechanics

  • 75+ items for your characters to equip or use in combat

  • The world and narrative conceived by GWENT and Cyberpunk: Edgerunners creator and writer of Witcher: Ronin and No\Name manga ‚Äî Rafa≈Ç Jaki

  • Original musical score by Balatro composer ‚Äî LouisF

    • DirectX: Version 11
